Preface

Standards compliance

The Functional Developer ORB version 2.0 conforms to the CORBA 2.0 specification with some elements of CORBA 2.2, most notably the Portable Object Adapter (POA). Work is underway to complete CORBA 2.2 compliance. See:

<URL:http://www.omg.org/corba/c2indx.htm>

This address may change.

Developing Component Software with CORBA - 26 May 1999
